summary: The implementation uses React with TypeScript and Motoko backend as specified, but several key requirements are missing or incomplete. The BuildRequest specified Chart.js should NOT be used, yet REQ-3 explicitly requires Chart.js for weekly progress chart. The implementation uses custom SVG visualization instead, which contradicts the requirement. The implementation stores data in the Motoko backend actor correctly. However, multiple navigation pages (Features, About, Contact) lack complete implementations in the truncated diff. Dark mode toggle and several UI requirements appear implemented correctly.

missing_requirements.requirement: Weekly progress chart should render using Chart.js library
missing_requirements.reason: The BuildRequest constraints prohibit Chart.js integration, but the requirement explicitly demands Chart.js. The implementation uses custom SVG-based WeeklyChart component instead of Chart.js, which satisfies the constraint but violates the explicit requirement.

missing_requirements.requirement: Technologies section should mention HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Chart.js
missing_requirements.reason: The About page content is truncated, but visible portions do not show a technologies section listing these specific technologies. Cannot confirm implementation due to truncation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement local storage to persist all user tracking data
missing_requirements.reason: The implementation stores data in the Motoko backend actor, not in browser localStorage as specified in REQ-11. The BuildRequest constraints require backend storage, but REQ-11 explicitly requires localStorage.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication system with hooks and context provider
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states Real authentication with password hashing or external auth providers as a non-goal. However, the implementation includes Internet Identity integration which is an external authentication provider.

hallucinated_features.description: React Query integration for state management
hallucinated_features.reason: The implementation includes extensive React Query usage which was not requested in any requirement. While not explicitly prohibited, it represents additional complexity beyond the specification.
